description: The Gloster Meteor FR.9 is a photo-reconaissance aircraft. It is a development of the F.8, with a slightly longer nose incorporting a camera that could be configured on the ground to be either overhead or oblique.
loadnotes: Stations 1 and 3 can each carry a 100 gal (450L) FT.
Ventral station 2 can only be used to carry a special jettisonable conformal 175 gal (800L) FT. While carried, the FT restricts the maximum speed to 4.0.
